title: Trump blasts FBI, Justice Dept bosses over Republican memo
text:
Trump blasts FBI, Justice Dept bosses over Republican memo 6:12pm IST - 02:05 
As the White House works to release a highly divisive Republican memo alleging anti-Trump bias at the FBI in the Russia probe, the President Friday stepping up his PR fight against the bureau. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
As the White House works to release a highly divisive Republican memo alleging anti-Trump bias at the FBI in the Russia probe, the President Friday stepping up his PR fight against the bureau.
